titleInfo.title: Movement detectors of the correlation type provide sufficient information for local computation of the 2-D velocity field
Neural and synergetic computers: proceedings of the international symposium at Schloß Elmau, Bavaria, June 13 - 17, 1988

Reichardt W, Schlögel RW, Egelhaaf M (1988)
